schema.description: Mod changelog entries grouped by year, sorted newest first

launcher: New version of the launcher released (3.0)
Newly designed Mod Config, Savegame tools, and Multiplayer tools based on feedback
System designed from the ground up to detect games, savegames, and system logs
Start of Unofficial Dev Tools auto-healing code
Can access Player_variables.scr and skills.xml and make changes, save to custom config
New backup tools will create backups when new game versions come out without mod released

fixes: Fix for Rais's men having animation glitches when holding rifles inside bases
Issue was caused by trying to get Rais's men to shoot infected near their fence line
Behavior places that force different animations on NPCs require them to not be holding weapons at ready

balance: Rebalanced the world - redesigned overall difficulty flow for the game
Progression throughout playthrough ensures meeting the largest amount of different enemy types
Enemies present new challenges while being fair
Can select any ingame difficulty to work with mod difficulties
worldDiversity: Added more NPCs from quests and other unused NPCs
Randomly generated NPCs added using Unofficial Dev Tool code
NPCs show up as friendlies trying to fight to survive
Roughly 332 males and 50 females added to the world randomly
fixes: Final fix for the creature from the black lagoon morph nightmare showing up for early players
Fix for spawn issues where biters were acting as humans and humans were acting as biters
Can add Normal Spawns module to remove hardcoded spawn point issues
notes: Module coming soon to restore original music as optional

fixes: Changed the Menu from the old do-nothing button into text

updates: Supports the new Texture update released on 06/26/25

fixes: Fix for crashes on Survivor difficulty due to restructuring Mod Config data
Added more support for making changes to Mod Config
newModule: Hellraid Support: Previously DLC scripts were built into IAL but caused errors for users without the DLC
Added as optional module for users who have Hellraid
installer: Fix for Reshade installer - code should now properly install Reshade if selected as Module
notes: Mod config currently defaults to Casual in Launcher for DL1
Casual difficulty coming soon - set to your installed difficulty when modifying values

fixes: Fix for bad merge with previous Audio fixes in Ultimate and Insanity
Fix for failure to properly install Insanity difficulty through the launcher
Fix for random crashes in Slums and Old Town
Small various fixes found on code review
notes: Launcher now supports very basic version of Mod Config for DL1
Entire system in launcher getting rework
Some Mod config values may not currently impact gameplay

fixes: Fix for silent runners
Fix for mesh tearing on some of the biters
launcher: New Launcher added to the I Am Legion mod page
Launcher currently doesn't support Mod config for DL1 - coming soon

features: Updated the mod to support Hellraid
Increased Hellraid enemy difficulty for both Ultimate and Insanity
Insanity has a chance to spawn special enemies in common pools
installer: Clean up and improvements to the installer
notes: Highly recommend COOP friends or high level play for Insanity Hellraid

newWeapons: Added 21 new crossbows to the world - added to loot, airdrops, and traders
Bolts added to the world traders
5 Ironclad Siege crossbows - more damage but fire slower, bolts punch through enemies
5 Marksmen crossbows - better aim but shoot slower
Rare Automatic Crossbow Type B - fires 5 bolts at a time rapid fire
fixes: Fix for not being able to use the hook while sprinting
Restored ability to use weapons while sprinting
Added the ability to pull zombies with the grapple
Fix for the zombie deformed bug
balance: Added higher chance for humans to randomly spawn on the map
Reduced view distance for enemy AI on Ultimate

fixes: Fixed multiple errors in Survivor edition of the Mod
Fixes for the visuals of the models
Removed the Giant Miners helmet easter egg (people thought it was a bug)
balance: Ultimate Survivor now features a blend of Runners and Walkers
features: Added non-actionable menu button on startup to show if mod is properly installed
Added new CONFIG option for health modifier for zombies
installer: Reversed Optional Map Spawn to Decrease the Zombies, not increase
Includes features for view distance and density system

majorUpdate: Ultimate Survivor and Insanity difficulties released

ultimateSurvivor: Common biters hunt the player, searching area and moving randomly across map
Makes nowhere safe - biters search high and low
Biters scream when spotting player, calling more biters
Biters can climb, jump, and crawl towards player
Relentless enemies - run until you have high ground
insanity: Similar to Ultimate but takes things up another notch
All enemies can see you at further distance and chase you further
Makes escape much more difficult over time

features: Reshade (Optional) included with installer for modern visual restoration
Home key - Reshade Menu, End key - Toggle on/off
installer: Release of the I Am Legion Installer for easier updates
notes: Casual Survivor and improvements to Survivor coming soon

fixes: Fix for loot spawn bug and system slowdown (maxed out the engine on spawns)
Removed firearms not being used by Rais's men
Reduced the amount of 'Large helmet' zombies
Fix for diversity not working due to Loot spawn bug
Fix for Old Town spawn bug - glitching zombies

features: Properly restored most of the AI features for the mod
Restored the trader functionalities - firearms back in shops early in game
fixes: Ton of fixes across the board from 1.27b release
Restored a lot of immersion components
loot: Updated loot system and inventory systems with improved loot spawns
Airdrops may contain firearms and ammo
Police and military vehicles may contain explosives and firearms

features: Diverse Zombies added to the spawns
Improved view distance for the world and LODs
balance: Better balancing for Human spawns in the world
Randomly stumble upon other humans trying to survive

fixes: Fix for black screen bug for Easy, Normal, and Hard players

majorUpdate: Part 1 of the overhaul for Dying Light 1
features: Added the IAL_Settings.mth config with lots of new options
Map density increased for each map (more zombies)
Some zombies now hunt for you and can climb
Improved grouping and AI communications for zombies and Humans
fixes: Fix for the Audio bug causing zombies to be silent
spawns: Bandit spawn diverse spawns return to the world
notes: The 3 difficulty versions and installer with optionals coming with Part 2
Definitely needs balancing, more coming soon

updates: Updated Dying Light 1's Survivor version with the latest 1.49.0 files
features: Added support for push to talk
Added all the new inventory and store items from DLCs
notes: This isn't the overhaul being worked on
Doesn't include the runner (ultimate) version yet
Should be more stable and include all new updates
